Trigger: the time is between 8:00 am and 5:00 pm AND outside temperature is above 60 degrees AND outside temperature is below 90 degrees AND the user is away
Action: switch off Air Conditioner AND switch off Fan AND close windowShade AND turn the Lighting off

Trigger: if time is after 1:00 pm AND time is before 7:00 pm
Action: open SecondBedroom_windowShade AND open LivingRoom_windowShade AND close MasterBedroom_windowShade AND close Kitchen_windowShade

Trigger: if time is after 1:00 pm AND time is before 7:00 pm
Action: open SecondBedroom_windowShade AND open LivingRoom_windowShade AND close MasterBedroom_windowShade AND close Kitchen_windowShade

Trigger: time is after 6:00 pm AND user is away AND sprinkler is ready AND smoke detector does not detect smoke
Action: setMachineState Clothes Dryer to Ready AND setDryerMode to Low Heat AND setMachineState to Running

get sessionStatus of Gas Stove AND lock Front_Door AND lock Back_Door AND switch on FrontDoor_SecurityCamera AND switch on BackDoor_SecurityCamera AND read odorLevel of Gas Sensor AND read Battery Status of All_SmokeDetectors AND turn on Motion Sensor

Trigger: if Away AND Time is 5:45 pm AND Day is Weekday AND mode is not Vacation
Action: setLevel of Air Conditioner to 74 and set airConditionerMode to "auto" AND turn Rice Cooker on AND start Rice Cooker AND switch on Light AND setLevel_Kitchen_Light to "Evening"AND setLevel_LivingRoom_Light to "Evening" AND set colorMode_Light_LivingRoom to "Golden Hour" AND set colorMode_Light_Kitchen to "Happy hour"
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am) | Manually-triggered (e.g. |  a button press)

Trigger: Storage_PetFoodFeeder is "low" AND Time is 12:00 pm AND Mode is not Vacation
Action: order (1) bag of dog food through Prime Now |  immediate delivery AND setMode for FrontPorch_Lockbox to "Amazon delivery" AND set FrontPorch_Lockbox Confirmation Push notification to "Delivery |  SMS"
